page.title: 11A SHROPSHIRE FARM
page.content: { {PRESTON BOATS FARM}is a l60 acre mixed farm, typical of its area, owned by Mr Allen.Some of the fields are up to 15km away from the farm house - a late l6th C. building. Store cattle are bought in the Autumn, fed on silage made during the Summer,and sold for slaughter in the spring. Sheep are farmed in a small way,some pigs are also kept. Crops include:- Oil Seed Rape - for the food industry Grass - for silage Barley and Wheat for brewing All the work is done by the owners with the help of casual labour in the busy season.Machinery includes 3 tractors and 1 Combine Harvester.The farm buildings are designed to make the work easier with a central area for silage and cattle sheds on either side.
